item.title: VMUG Usercon 2022 Abstract
item.description: VMUG Usercon 2022 Abstract Concept Description Submission abstract for VMware User Group Usercons in 2022 Text Five Lessons Learned from 45 Career Stories on The Nerd Journey Podcast After interviewing over 45 unique guests through 160+ episodes since launch in July 2018, John White and Nick Korte are still just two nerds on a journey to career enlightenment.
